name: Now you See me (Haiyoooo | Designer & Artist)
name_original: Now you See me (Haiyoooo | Designer & Artist)
description:
Hello little light one, how far can you descend? Asked the hungry monster.

Play as a glowing ball of light falling through an endless nightmare.
Infinite runner with a twist - sometimes you can't be seen!

Features:

  • Hardcore, Learn-by-Dying
  • Use real-time dynamic shadows to figure out your location!
  • Speed increases as you go deeper!
  • Procedurally generated levels after 100m!

Credits:

Made solo in 5h for Ludum Dare 48
Music from https://www.epidemicsound.com/

Controls:

  • ESC to restart
  • Keyboard: A/D or arrow keys to move left/right
  • Touch: Tap left/right side of screen to move left/right
